title: Before reading some code, it is important to undersand the main concepts that will help to program applications using json.

title: Serialization: Process of converting a object into a stream of bytes that can be sent through applications. The following code can be serialized and converted into the previous json.

title: Deserialization: Process of converting a json/stream of bytes into an object. Its exactly the opposite process of serialization. The previous json can be deserialized into an C# object as demonstrated in examples below.

inline_content.Text: Deserialization: Process of converting a json/stream of bytes into an object. Its exactly the opposite process of serialization. The previous json can be deserialized into an C# object as demonstrated in examples below.

title: To work this out, it is important to turn the json structure into classes in order to use processes already described. If you use Visual Studio, you can turn a json into a class automatically just by selecting
“Edit/Paste Special/Paste JSON as Classes”
i
and pasting the json structure.
